name: System Exit
description:
SystemExit() Modifications
  • I created a health power-up item and script and added a health display UI item/script to the score/high score display.
  • I created a new portal asset that lets you exit to the next level and the associated script for it.
  • I used the pyramid space station art asset along with a modification of the Enemy script to create a Boss enemy that you must defeat for the last level.
  • I modified the enemy assets and created a new Mine enemy that is stationary and shoots in 4 diagonal directions.
  • I created 3 levels:
    • In the first level, you have to flee your home system under attack and find the portal to exit.
    • In the second level, you have to make it past a blockade including mines and other enemies.
    • In the third level, you must defeat the boss space station to win the game.

Credits
  • Created by Richard Anton
  • Most of the base assets  and scripts come from https://www.coursera.org/learn/game-design-and-development-1/home/info
